amendment.description: Amendment added an Energy Conservation Corps, which would seek to address the nation's energy and transportation infrastructure needs while providing work and service opportunities.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 110-539 to add an Energy Conservation Corps, which would seek to address the nation's energy and transportation infrastructure needs while providing work and service opportunities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A011) Agreed to by recorded vote: 252 - 161 (Roll no. 106).
